definition: of the brown color of rust, any of various fungi causing rust disease in plants, become coated with oxide
details:
adjective
- of the brown color of rust
= synonyms: rusty, rust-brown
noun
- any of various fungi causing rust disease in plants
= synonyms: rust fungus
- the formation of reddish-brown ferric oxides on iron by low-temperature oxidation in the presence of water
= synonyms: rusting
- a plant disease that produces a reddish-brown discoloration of leaves and stems
= example: a plant disease that produces a reddish-brown discoloration of leaves and stems
- a red or brown oxide coating on iron or steel caused by the action of oxygen and moisture
verb
- become coated with oxide
- become destroyed by water, air, or a corrosive such as an acid
= synonyms: corrode
- cause to deteriorate due to the action of water, air, or an acid
= synonyms: corrode, eat
